profile:
Bestloc Interlocking is trusted and respected landscape design and Installation company operating in the Greater Toronto and Surrounding Areas. As a proud and certified member of ICPI (Interlocking and Concrete Pavement Institute), we provide our clients with award winning landscape designs and industry leading installations. Bestloc was found on two main principles of encouraging family outdoor living and building structures that last.

Many years ago, Ryan Morant, founder and president started out being a labourer, where he developed his passion for the trade. He then became a foreman, and inspector, and subsequently a teacher. Under his leadership, our professional team of highly skilled and qualified personnel provides innovative landscape designs. With over 15 years of planting and masonry experience, and hundreds of thousands of square feet laid, Bestloc Interlocking embodies the values of strength, performance, and passion. We are dedicated to providing our clients with custom landscaping solutions.

We are in constant communication with our friends at ICPI (Interlocking and Concrete Pavement Institute), and are always up-to-date on industry leading techniques on landscape designs and installations. We offer good communication with our clients from the beginning of each project to its completion. Our experienced project management means your project is completed on time and on budget.

Furthermore, we complete every task with a commitment to integrity and a devotion to excellence using the best quality products guaranteed to leave a lasting impression. If you wish to create the finest outdoor living experience for you and your family, please do not hesitate to contact Bestloc Interlocking for a free consultation/estimate.
